type.Daylight Amulet: *Enchanted [[Stones and minerals|stones]] that protects a vampire from the sunlight.
type.Silas' Tombstone: * [[Stones and minerals|Stone]] from calcified [[blood]] charged with enormous amount of magic
type.Moonlight Amulet: * Enchanted [[Stones and minerals|stones]] that allows a werewolf to control their transformation.

type.Staff of Arcadius: *Acoustic Resonator <small>(Part of the [[Mystic Falls Founders Bell]])</small>

status.Gilbert Ring:
*Inactive <small>(Due to the destruction of the Other Side)</small>refhttp://vampirediaries.alloyentertainment.com/caroline-dries-season-6-interview-529141/</ref>
**Currently [[Matt Donovan|Matt]] has [[Jeremy Gilbert|Jeremy]]'s ring
**[[Alaric Saltzman|Alaric]]'s ring was bound to the [[White Oak Stake]] by [[Esther Mikaelson|Esther]].
status.White Oak Ash Daggers:
*Three owned by [[Rebekah Mikaelson]]
*One owned by [[Elijah Mikaelson]]
*One owned by [[Davina Claire]] (melted)
*One owned by [[Kol Mikaelson]] (unknown status)
*One owned by [[Niklaus Mikaelson|Klaus Mikaelson]]
status.Esther's Talisman:
* In the [[Cave and underground tunnels|Secret Cave]] <small>(Original)</small>
*In [[Damon Salvatore|Damon]]'s possession <small>(1994 Prison World Copy)</small>
status.The Cure:
*Existing 
**<small>Original version (ingested by [[Katerina Petrova|Katherine]], [[Silas]] through Katerina's blood and [[Amara]] through Silas's blood)</small>
**<small>1994 version (ingested by [[Elena Gilbert|Elena]] and injected in [[Stefan Salvatore|Stefan]] through Elena's blood and injected in [[Damon Salvatore|Damon]] through Stefan's blood)</small>
**<small>1903 version (destroyed through annihilation of [[Prison Worlds]]/[[Malachai Parker|Kai]]'s death)</small>
status.Qetsiyah's Talisman: *In [[Qetsiyah]]'s possession, prior to her death. Currently Unknown
status.Esther's Grimoires: *The majority of her books are in the possession of the [[Mikaelson Family]]; some have been destroyed
status.Elijah's Journal: * Unknown <small>(Possibly in Elijah's possession now that Sophie is dead)</small>
status.The Needle of Sorrows: *Unknown <small>(either in [[Niklaus Mikaelson|Klaus]]' or the [[Harvest Witch|Harvest Girl]]'s possession)</small>
status.Ripper Virus: *Eradicated <small>(Only two compounds were in existence and both were used)</small>
status.Moonlight Amulet:
* All 12 stones destroyed that were created by [[Genevieve]]
* More were being mass produced by Esther <small>(unknown)</small>
* Many were collected and given to [[Jackson Kenner|Jackson]] and [[Hayley Marshall-Kenner|Hayley]] <small>(unknown)</small>
* One in possession of [[Keelin]]
status.Ascendant:
* 1994 Actual One damaged in the actual world
* 1903 Actual One destroyed by [[Bonnie Bennett|Bonnie]]
* 2018 Actual One created by [[Josie Saltzman|Josie]] and [[Lizzie Saltzman|Lizzie]] <small> (with the help of [[Bonnie Bennett]]) </small>
status.Elena's Coffin: Located in the [[Salvatore Boarding House|Salvatore mansion]].
status.Staff of Arcadius: Welded to the Mystic Falls Founder's Bell
